data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Balrampur to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Balrampur, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Balrampur. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Balrampur, Chhattisgarh, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Balrampur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Gond Singhrolia people might believe through him.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Balrampur that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 50 believers in Balrampur, Chhattisgarh, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the county of Balrampur, Chhattisgarh, India has a population of 4,500.

We estimate Balrampur has 50 people who might know Jesus, 55 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,396 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Balrampur, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
